text: Franco Cacialli is an Italian physicist affiliated with the University College London. He was awarded the status of Fellow in the American Physical Society, after he was nominated by the Division of Materials Physics in 2009, for "his significant contributions to the science and technology of organic semiconductors and related applications, and especially for seminal contributions to the scanning near-field optical microscopy (SNOM) assisted lithography of organic semiconductor nanostructures. == References == Category:Fellows of the American Physical Society Category:Italian physicists Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Alumni of the University of Cambridge Category:University of Pisa alumni Category:1960s births
title: Franco Cacialli
